feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.9.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Improve detection of shorts by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/382
  • [Enhancement] Allow configuration of media container format by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/383
  • [Bugfix] Disallow concurrent slow-indexing runs for the same source by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/384
  • [Dev] Speed up CI by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/385
  • [Dev] Version updates 2024-09-12 by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/388

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.8.28...v2024.9.12

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] prevent duplicate videos from being downloaded if the video's name changes by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/396
  • [Enhancement] Added ability to detect when files have been deleted by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/399
  • [Bugfix] Resolve invalid timezone error by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/402

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.9.12...v2024.10.2

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.10.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Flip Config submenu arrow by @FibreTTP in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/405
  • [Docs] document that BASE_ROUTE_PATH requires the prefix to be stripped by @jbergler in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/413
  • [Bugfix] Fix off-by-1 error for retention date logic by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/432
  • [Enhancement] Misc. UI updates by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/434
  • [Enhancement] Improve error message when adding a source who's details can't be queried by URL by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/436

New Contributors

  • @FibreTTP made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/405
  • @jbergler made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/413

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.10.2...v2024.10.25

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.10.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Improve timezone handling when provided TZ is invalid by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/441
  • [Bugfix] Ensure that playlist_index remains persisted in all cases by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/442
  • [Enhancement] Improve short detection logic (again) by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/447

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.10.25...v2024.10.30

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.11.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Track the predicted final filepath for indexed media items by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/461
  • [Enhancement] Add support for yt-dlp plugins + add lifecycle script event for app boot by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/465
  • [Enhancement] Add option to use existing Media Profile as template for new profile by @loop-index in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/466
  • [Enhancement] Adds ability to enable/disable sources by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/481
  • [Bugfix] Ensure livestreams aren't downloaded until they're finished processing by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/485
  • [Enhancement] Add audio track language selection to Media Profile by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/487

New Contributors

  • @loop-index made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/466

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.10.30...v2024.11.27
